# FableRealm: Castle Builder

> Establish a magical kingdom, manage ancient mana, and grow your fairytale village under the guidance of the Royal Wizard.

## Core Documentation
- [Policy](docs/DOC_POLICY.md): Governance and provenance rules.
- [Security](docs/SECURITY.md): Threat model and safety.
- [Architecture](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): System design and boundaries.
- [Framework](docs/FRAMEWORK.md): Tech stack and tools.
- [Changelog](docs/CHANGELOG.md): Version history.

## Agents
- [Documentation Authority](docs/AGENTS_DOCUMENTATION_AUTHORITY.md): System prompt for docs governance.
